name: King of the Alley
description:
Help Jack Hammer put an end to the insect crisis that has been spreading death all over the world.

In this 2D Action Shooter, you're tasked with saving the world from dangerous cyborg insects. 

We dedicate this game to our friends and colleagues who gave us feedback and made the development a fun journey through our insanity.

Grab your gun, get on your car, humanity's fate is in your hands!
